transcript: how much do you pay a personal trainer for a training session how much do you pay somebody to help you fix your sales process a lot more for the guy to help you fix your sales process that was my most valuable skill that I had developed and so that was the one I traded with most often I could walk into a company I already went through your entire funnel I already saw your follow-up sequences I hopped on the phone with one of your guys when you do that do you think the person whose business you did that for will not try and offer to help you in some way of course they will and if you're like dude I don't know how to run YouTube ads they're like dude whatever you need I've got you that's how you provide value to people
